event.title: Karsten Gerloff talk at the LinuxCon Europe 2012

body.p:
Karsten Gerloff, FSFE president, will give a talk about general purpose computing as a question of power and control on Novenber, 6th in Barcelona (spain) at the LinuxcConEurope. Entitled as
"All watched over by machines of loving grace?", the speech will be at 13:20 at the Hotel Fira Palace
